SUSTAINABILITY APPROACH AT K&SIn FY2019, K&S enhanced its CR Policy, committing to continually 
improving its effectiveness on economic, environmental, and social 
impacts to make a difference for a better future. The CR policy 
identified four strategic aspects, Economic, Environment, Social and 
Governance, which is mapped to support five of the United Nations 
Sustainability Development Goals (SDGs).
